what.title: What is this?
what.text: I am Hodei Eceiza Zaldua, at the moment I work as web developer and I created this web to use as a presentation of myself.

how.title: How this web was built?
how.text: I used Vite framework to create the fronted using Vue. I tried to use as little third packages as possible and I deployed the frontend in Netifly. The backend is a simple RestAPI created with Go and deployed in Render. For store and database I used Delta. The backend module has a basic cms to be able to upload info to the store and database from a local computer

bio.helpMessage: click on the filters down there to show my bio cards
